    • Uses of Trick in shrey.number.sense

      Subclasses of Trick in shrey.number.sense 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EstimationBasic
      Generates problems (with solution) which are intended to be practice multiplying and dividing large integers, with a touch of addition/subtraction thrown in.
      class  FReciprocal
      Generator of problem statements where a fraction is added to its reciprocal.
      class  Same10
      Generates problem statements (with solution) of the time AB * AC =?.
      class  Same10AddTo5
      Generates problem statements (with solution) of type AB * AC =?, with B + C = 5.
      class  T3367
      Generates problem statements (with solution) of the type 3367 * AB.
      class  Trick1
      Generate problem statements (with solution) of the type 1A * BC =?.
      class  TrickFoil
      Generates problems (with solution) intended for practice in quickly multiplying two digit integers.
      class  TrickMult123
      Generates problems (with solution) meant for practice multiplying three digit integers where each integer is composed of the first three digits.

      This method, for all intents and purposes, replaces and improves the deprecated method trick().
